description: The Voxophone music app: you sing and it turns your voice into a musical instrument.

scripts.ios-emulator: npm run lint && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.watch-ios-emulator: npm run lint && tns livesync ios --emulator --watch
scripts.watch-ios: npm run lint && tns livesync ios --watch
scripts.watch-android: npm run lint && tns livesync android --watch
scripts.ios: npm run lint && tns run ios
scripts.android: npm run lint && tns run android
scripts.debug-ios-emulator: npm run lint && tns debug ios --debug-brk --emulator
scripts.debug-ios: npm run lint && tns debug ios --debug-brk --timeout 180
scripts.debug-android: npm run lint && tns debug android
scripts.watch-debug-ios-emulator: npm run lint && tns debug ios --no-rebuild --debug-brk --emulator
scripts.debug-watch-ios-emulator: npm run lint && tns debug ios --no-rebuild --debug-brk --emulator
scripts.debug-watch-ios: npm run lint && tns debug ios --no-rebuild --debug-brk
scripts.watch-debug-ios: npm run lint && tns debug ios --no-rebuild --debug-brk
scripts.debug-watch-android: npm run lint && tns debug android --no-rebuild --debug-brk
scripts.watch-debug-android: npm run lint && tns debug android --no-rebuild --debug-brk
scripts.reinstall-engine: npm run remove-engine && npm run install-engine && npm run reinstall-platforms
